<md-button> is a button directive with optional ink ripples (default enabled).

If you supply a href or ng-href attribute, it will become an <a> element. Otherwise, it will become a <button> element.

As per the material design spec the FAB button is in the accent color by default. The primary color palette may be used with the md-primary class.

Usage

Button I'm a link I'm a disabled button

Attributes

Parameter
Type
Description
md-no-ink boolean
(optional)
boolean

If present, disable ripple ink effects.
ng-disabled expression
(optional)
expression

En/Disable based on the expression
md-ripple-size string
(optional)
string

Overrides the default ripple size logic. Options: full, partial, auto
aria-label string
(optional)
string

Adds alternative text to button for accessibility, useful for icon buttons. If no default text is found, a warning will be logged.
